text: 6:4-5 Rom 2:6; 14:12; 1 Korin 3:8; 11:28; 2 Korin 13:5Gumazamiziba bar, me uari uan arazir me amibar osɨmtɨziba ateram. Gumazamiziba uari uan ingangaribar gan, da deras ti puvatɨ. Gumazamiziba kamaghɨn damuva, me uari uan arazibar gan dagh ifongegh. Egh me uan arazibar gan, egh gumazir igharazimɨn arazibara gan dav kɨman markɨ.
